com.sshtools.ssh.components

Interface SshHmac

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractHmac, HmacMD5, HmacMD596, HmacSha1, HmacSha196, HmacSha256, HmacSha512, NoneHmac

    public interface SshHmac
    This interface should be implemented by all message authentication implementations.
    Author:
    Lee David Painter
